Delete:
rnext               <= s_axi_rvalid & s_axi_rready & ~s_axi_rlast;        
          txrd_access         <= ( ~ractive_reg & read_active ) | rnext;
Add:
rnext               <= s_axi_rvalid & s_axi_rready & ~s_axi_rlast;    
          txrd_access         <= ( ~ractive_reg & read_active ) | rnext;
